DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct 5 site , 4 United States 1 site Israel . 40,000 clinical specimen include assessed laboratory use standard reference method P-1000 .
DOC.criteria: Samples arrive laboratory urine culture Samples < =2mL Specimens store room temperature 2 hour ( unless preservative use ) Specimens refrigerate 24 hour Specimens request low count urine culture ( < 100,000 CFU/mL [ colony form unit per milliliter ] ) Bloody specimen
